forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. West wind 15 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
